body: A minor remind that the text explanation for "**heating**" on **Read EP Result** component may need to be revised for the words "**removed from**" as shown below: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/PsHg1vuKcVNBGm5rWJqCLPIKVI1-wyzmlTVX5TILSPUp-5SEBNYC4Co7C6gjt4LsjVAkg03SWfSx4nBC3EGxjm5CxDhL2TPC/Image2.png)
topic: words in the explanation for "heating" on Read EP Result component may need to be revised

replies.body:
Hi Ji. Thanks. I added this to github so Chris can revise it.

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/557](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/557)

Ji,



Thanks for letting us know.  It seems I fixed this a while back but in the wrong part of the code.  It should show up correctly now:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/commit/fb3c7f8794a22aa...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/commit/fb3c7f8794a22aa192f56c0fb9f57e3f66edc69f)



-Chris

Thank you very much, Chris and Mostapha, for the update!



- Ji
